title: Everglades National Park: Pineland Trail
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Hiking Trails     Pine Island Trails     Pineland Trail                  Pineland Trail      Trail Length:  0.4 miles (650 meters) round trip   Wheelchair Accessible:  Yes, though there are narrow and uneven places where roots have pushed the pavement up. Bicycles Allowed: No Trail Description:  This trail loops through a forest of pines, palmettos, and wildflowers. Directions to Trail:  Seven miles (11km) from the main park entrance/ Ernest Coe Visitor Center.       Information kiosk at the trailhead         Pine trees and saw palmetto along the Pineland Trail
